summary:
A seasoned energy professional with broad techno-economic experience across different segments including conventional oil and gas, mining, to the next generation low-emission technologies including CCUS, hydrogen, ammonia, jet-fuel, nuclear, e-mobility and grid-storage. I like to think of myself as a resourceful problem solver who has ability to integrate multi-disciplinary data using digital tools to draw key insights, and leverage them to build the big-picture to devise strategic roadmaps for sustainable growth. I pride myself as someone who loves to investigate “why and when it matters” because I believe, that drives the “how it is done” part of the puzzle through innovation.

I have designed and led strategic and operational programs to accelerate energy transition, sustainability and digital transformation for clients across Oil & Gas, chemical and utilities sectors. I possess a strong drive to embrace, imbibe and capitalize changing needs, market drivers and technological ecosystem associated with it; reflected in the variety of roles and experiences accumulated. Trusted by academia, industry and non-profit for energy thought-leadership as partner, speaker and reviewer on different forums of repute, I thrive on building a shared vision across multidisciplinary stakeholders, from business to senior executives, and deliver nimble and agile results of highest quality that are people-centric and focused on generating long-term values.

profile_positions.title: OBO Assurance Geoscientist, BP India

profile_positions.description:
Own and lead technical studies to develop geological descriptions and reservoir models for recommending infill production targets. Carry out uncertainty and risk analysis through alternative scenario modeling and simulation to feed into Area Development Plan and develop business strategy with partners and stakeholders.

I also lead digital transformation on multiple fronts such as, but not limited to development of web based, platform independent GIS mapping tools hosted on cloud, ML driven stratigraphic core-log interpretations, AI enhanced seismic interpretation and easy to use PowerApps tools. I am also a Scrum master/Agile practitioner and early adopter of DevOps project management.
In the spirit of continuous learning, I provide -
•	Thought leadership through R&D and innovation via peer assist and presentations to future energy forums such as Carbon Capture Utilization & Storage (CCUS), Hydrogen, Data Science and Salesforce power users.
•	Knowledge sharing and collaboration through presentations in Community of Practices, partner engagements & technical workshops
